adjectives.description: unsoldierly (comparative more unsoldierly, superlative most unsoldierly)

entries.meaning: Not soldierly, not appropriate for a soldier.
examples: His desertion was condemned as an unsoldierly act of cowardice.

adverbs.description: unsoldierly (comparative more unsoldierly, superlative most unsoldierly)

entries.meaning: In a manner that is not appropriate for a soldier.
examples: A few of them limped unsoldierly in deference to blistered feet.
